Latest COVID-19 Update

We are open

checkmirrors continues to remain committed to the safety of both our instructors and students, therefor from 19th July 2021 we still require the use of face masks and sanitiser in all of our vehicles.

We are open!

Lessons are now going ahead as usual with full Covid precautions in place. Book here.

Wear a mask

To ensure the safety of both students and our instructors, wearing a face mask is required at all times.

Clean cars

A further step to make learning to drive safer with checkmirrors, we now clean each of our cars thoroughly between lessons.

Clean hands

We provide hand sanitiser in all of our cars and kindly request students to use the hand sanitiser before each lesson.

Don't worry, you can still book your driving lesson, please note that bookings may be delayed until after lockdown has been lifted.

Book from only £30 per hour or 10 lessons for £290

FAQs

Here are some of our most frequently asked Questions.

Even though the government has decided to lift most restrictions, we at checkmirrors have decided to continue to require face masks and sanitiser for both instructors and students.

We have made this decision as we feel it is important to continue to keep our instructors and students as safe as we can during such an uncertain period.

Checkmirrors are back to operating as usual which means you can now book and have your lessons with our excellent team of ADI Driving Instructors. You can book your driving lessons with checkmirrors by calling 07821 291 783 or booking online. All of the checkmirros driving instructors will be following government guidance and national and local lockdown rules.

Yes, we are still be accepting new students. We will ask you some questions covid related questions prior to your first lesson to make sure you’re feeling well and able. Please contact us here or via our Facebook page

Here at checkmirrors we have several procedures in place to protect our students and driving instructors alike, which we review regularly in line with government guidance.

  • All students and driving instructors must wear a face mask or covering at all times
  • All cars are thoroughly cleaned between each lesson
  • Hand sanitiser is provided in all of our cars
